Package com.newatlanta.nio.file.spi

Service-provider classes for the com.newatlanta.nio.file package.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
FileSystemProvider Service-provider class for file systems.
FileTypeDetector A file type detector for probing a file to guess its file type.
 

Package com.newatlanta.nio.file.spi Description

Service-provider classes for the com.newatlanta.nio.file package.

Only developers who are defining new file system providers or file type detectors should need to make direct use of this package.

Unless otherwise noted, passing a null argument to a constructor or method in any class or interface in this package will cause a NullPointerException to be thrown.

Since:
1.7
